items.Justification: Does not relate to adaptive optics, optical communication, or atmospheric turbulence.
While it involves wave phenomena, it is not directly related to adaptive optics or optical communication systems.
Focuses on the chaotic behavior of frequency combs, not directly relevant to adaptive optics or atmospheric turbulence monitoring.
Deals with theoretical physics concepts unrelated to practical aspects of optical engineering, free space optics, or laser communication.
The concept of a twisted wavefront is relevant to adaptive optics and wavefront sensing, thus potentially interesting for the researcher.
